name: Yuri on ice - rakuten.co.jp
additional_info: Yuri!!! on Ice (Japanese: ユーリ!!! on ICE?) is a sports anime television series about figure skating. The anime was produced by MAPPA, directed by Sayo Yamamoto and written by Mitsurō Kubo. Character design was by Tadashi Hiramatsu, and its music was composed by Taro Umebayashi and Taku Matsushiba
